scrape() scrapegpt_researcher.scraper.web_base_loader.web_base_loader.WebBaseLoaderScraper gpt_researcher.scraper.web_base_loader.web_base_loader.WebBaseLoaderScraperscrape
str gpt_researcher.scraper.web_base_loader.web_base_loader.WebBaseLoaderScraper.scrape ( self)
This Python function scrapes content from a webpage using a WebBaseLoader object and returns the concatenated page content.
Returns: The `scrape` method is returning a string variable named `content` which contains the concatenated page content from the documents loaded by the `WebBaseLoader`. If an exception occurs during the process, an error message is printed and an empty string is returned.
